content:
That's a wonderful idea! A handwritten note is a thoughtful and personal touch that will make the gift even more special. Including a special message and a fun memory you've shared together will make it even more meaningful and heartfelt.

I'm glad I could help with some ideas. Remember, the most important thing is to speak from your heart and express your genuine feelings and love for your niece. She'll appreciate the effort and thoughtfulness you put into the note, and it will likely become a treasured keepsake for her.

If you have any other questions or need any more assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your niece has a wonderful birthday and enjoys her art supplies kit and personalized note!

Happy birthday to your niece, and I hope you both have a wonderful time celebrating together!
